thread.title: Torpoint Ferry service reduced most of day for repairs
thread.title_full: Torpoint Ferry service reduced most of day for repairs

author: WMNlynbarton
title: Torpoint Ferry service reduced most of day for repairs
text:
Torpoint Ferry service reduced most of day for repairs By WMNlynbarton | Posted: August 17, 2015 Torpoint Ferry service reduced most of day for repairs X 
Copy link to paste in your message / Comments (0) 
The Torpoint ferry service will be reduced to two boats for most of the day. 
Tamar Bridge and Torpoint Ferry Joint Committee said ongoing problems with pulley wheels on one of the ferries will be repaired during the course of the day. 
However, this can not take place until low tide in early afternoon. 
As a result, two ferries will run through most of the day although it is planned to have three ferries back in service by rush hour this afternoon.
